TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NumericUpDown extends System.Windows.Forms.UpDownBase implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class NumericUpDown Inherits UpDownBase Implements ISupportInitialize
type NumericUpDown = class inherit UpDownBase interface ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示显示数值的 Windows 数字显示框（也称作 up-down 控件）。

span.span: Represents a Windows spin box (also known as an up-down control) that displays numeric values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件包含单个数值，通过单击控件的向上或向下按钮可以增加或减少该值。A control contains a single numeric value that can be incremented or decremented by clicking the up or down buttons of the control. 用户还可以输入值，除非 属性设置为 `true`。The user can also enter in a value, unless the property is set to `true`. 可以通过设置 ""、"" 或 "" 属性来设置数值显示的格式。The numeric display can be formatted by setting the , , or properties. 若要在控件中显示十六进制值，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To display hexadecimal values in the control, set the property to `true`. 若要在适当的时候显示十进制数字中的千位分隔符，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To display a thousands separator in decimal numbers when appropriate, set the property to `true`. 若要指定在小数点符号后显示的位数，请将 属性设置为要显示的小数位数。To specify the number of digits displayed after the decimal symbol, set the property to the number of decimal places to display. 若要为控件指定允许的值范围，请设置 "" 和 "" 属性。To specify the allowable range of values for the control, set the and properties. 设置 值，以指定当用户单击向上或向下箭头按钮时要递增或递减到 属性的值。Set the value to specify the value to be incremented or decremented to the property when the user clicks the up or down arrow buttons. 当用户通过设置 "" 属性连续按向上或向下箭头时，可以提高控件在数字间移动的速度。You can increase the speed that the control moves through numbers when the user continuously presses the up or down arrow by setting the property. 当调用 或 方法（在代码中或通过单击向上或向下按钮）时，将验证新值并使用适当格式的新值更新控件。When the or methods are called, either in code or by the click of the up or down buttons, the new value is validated and the control is updated with the new value in the appropriate format. 具体而言，如果 属性设置为 `true`，则在验证或更新值之前调用 方法。Specifically, if the property is set to `true`, the method is called prior to validating or updating the value. 然后，将值验证为介于 和 值之间，并调用 方法。The value is then verified to be between the and values, and the method is called. 从 .NET Framework 4.6 开始，当 app.config 文件包含以下项时，将根据系统 DPI 设置调整 控件的大小：Starting with the .NET Framework 4.6, the control will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ```   ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化一个 控件，设置其一些公共属性，并允许用户在运行时更改其中的某些属性。The following code example creates and initializes a control, sets some of its common properties, and allows the user to change some of these properties at run time. 此代码假定已将三个 控件放置在窗体上，并且已实例化其 事件的处理程序。This code assumes three controls have been placed on a form and handlers for their events have been instantiated. 、和 属性设置为每个复选框的 事件。The , , and properties are set on the event of each check box. [!code-cpp[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NumericUpDown Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic NumericUpDown Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Accelerations As NumericUpDownAccelerationCollection

summary.span: 获取存储的 控件的加速对象的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of sorted acceleration objects for the control.

value.span: 包含存储的 控件的加速对象。

span.span: A containing the sorted acceleration objects for the control

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可用于提高在用户使用键盘或鼠标进行按住向上或向下箭头时， 在大量数字集中移动的速度。The property can be used to increase the speed with which the moves through a large set of numbers when the user holds the up or down arrow, either with the keyboard or with the mouse. 设置此属性将减少发生的 事件数，具体取决于为集合中的每个 对象指定的 和 属性值。Setting this property will decrease the number of events that occur depending on the and property values specified for each object in the collection. 集合中包含的 对象按其 属性进行排序。The objects contained in the collection are sorted by their property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法调用 `InitializeAcceleratedUpDown` 方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a form and call the `InitializeAcceleratedUpDown` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. 代码运行时，按住上箭头或下箭头以查看加速发生的时间。While the code is running, press and hold the up or down arrow to see the acceleration occur. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/VB/form1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取或设置数字显示框（也称作 up-down 控件）中要显示的十进制位数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of decimal places to display in the spin box (also known as an up-down control).

summary.span: 此属性不会影响 属性。

span.span: This property doesn't affect the property.

value.span: 数字显示框中要显示的十进制位数。

span.span: The number of decimal places to display in the spin box.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 属性后，将调用 方法，将数字显示框的显示更新为新格式。When the property is set, the method is called to update the spin box's display to the new format. 适当的十进制符号由用户的操作系统的区域设置决定。The appropriate decimal symbol is determined by the regional settings of the user's operating system. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化一个 控件，设置其一些公共属性，并允许用户在运行时更改其中的某些属性。The following code example creates and initializes a control, sets some of its common properties, and allows the user to change some of these properties at run time. 此代码假定已将三个 控件放置在窗体上，并且已实例化其 事件的处理程序。This code assumes three controls have been placed on a form and handlers for their events have been instantiated. 、和 属性设置为每个复选框的 事件。The , , and properties are set on the event of each check box. span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类的 " 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类的 " 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性设置为 `true`，则显示的文本将转换为数值，以便可以验证该文本在 和 属性值之间。If the property is set to `true`, the text displayed is converted to a numeric value so it can be validated to be between the and property values.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在适当的时候数字显示框（也称作 up-down 控件）中是否显示千位分隔符。

value.span: 如果在适当的情况下在数字显示框中显示千位分隔符，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a thousands separator is displayed in the spin box when appropriate; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 属性后，将调用 方法，将数字显示框的显示更新为新格式。When the property is set, the method is called to update the spin box's display to the new format. 适当的千位分隔符取决于用户的操作系统的区域设置。The appropriate thousands separator is determined by the regional settings of the user's operating system. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化一个 控件，设置其一些公共属性，并允许用户在运行时更改其中的某些属性。The following code example creates and initializes a control, sets some of its common properties, and allows the user to change some of these properties at run time. 此代码假定已将三个 控件放置在窗体上，并且已实例化其 事件的处理程序。This code assumes three controls have been placed on a form and handlers for their events have been instantiated. 、和 属性设置为每个复选框的 事件。The , , and properties are set on the event of each check box. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ValueChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 在以某种方式更改 属性后发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property has been changed in some way.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要发生 事件，可通过单击 "上移" 或 "下移" 按钮，或用户输入由控件读取的新值，在代码中更改 属性。For the event to occur, the property can be changed in code, by clicking the up or down button, or by the user entering a new value that is read by the control. 当用户按 ENTER 键或离开控件时，会读取新的值。The new value is read when the user hits the ENTER key or navigates away from the control. 如果用户输入新值，然后单击向上或向下按钮，则 事件将发生两次。If the user enters a new value and then clicks the up or down button, the event will occur twice. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `NumericUpDown1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `NumericUpDown1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#515](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#515)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#515](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#515)]
